data.title: Bookmark Startpage
data.description: I created a simple startpage to house a series of bookmarks of commonly used sites for work for easy access, using HTML, CSS and Javascript.

data.title: Reddit Scrapper
data.description: I developed a tool to download and organize images, based on shape, from the r/analog subreddit to use as background images, using Python, praw (Reddit API wrapper) and Beautiful Soup module.

data.title: Personal Logo
data.description: I made a personal and branding for myself using Inkscape.

data.title: Audio File Metadata Updater
data.description: I developed a set of tools to help with reading, removing & updating the metadata of audio files (flac & mp3) and to help keep track of all files within a local database, using Python and the Mutagen module.

data.title: Vue Portfolio Site
data.description: I created an online portfolio website using the Vue framework.
